titles.title: To provide for an educational center in Haleakala National Park in Hawaii.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 9/6/2001--Introduced. Amends Federal law to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the planning, construction, maintenance, and operation of an educational center at the headquarters of Haleakala National Park, Hawaii.
